title: Google\Cloud\Asset\V1\TableFieldSchema
name: TableFieldSchema
description:
A field in TableSchema.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.asset.v1.TableFieldSchema

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.field
params.description: The field name. The name must contain only letters (a-z, A-Z), numbers (0-9), or underscores (_), and must start with a letter or underscore. The maximum length is 128 characters.

params.name: data.type
params.description: The field data type. Possible values include STRING BYTES INTEGER FLOAT BOOLEAN TIMESTAMP DATE TIME DATETIME GEOGRAPHY, NUMERIC, BIGNUMERIC, * RECORD (where RECORD indicates that the field contains a nested schema).

params.name: data.mode
params.description: The field mode. Possible values include NULLABLE, REQUIRED and REPEATED. The default value is NULLABLE.

params.name: data.fields
params.description: Describes the nested schema fields if the type property is set to RECORD.
